original: ākiñcanyāyatanabītarāgasya bhavāgratāduccalitasya śāntavihāra - saṃjñāpūrvakeṇa manasikāreṇāsthāvarāṇāṃ cittacaittadharmāṇāṃ tadekatyānāṃ ca  #

original: spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ catvāri mahābhūtāni uktaśca yaḥ spraṣṭabyaikadeśaḥ // 122 //

āyatana uddyeśa nirdeśakaḥ dvitīya adhikāraḥ pariniṣṭhitaḥ
cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ dhātavaḥ rūpa ādayaḥ dhātavaḥ ca yathā āyatanāni
ṣaṭ vijñāna dhātavaḥ cakṣuḥ ādi āśrayāḥ rūpa ādi ālambanā vijñaptayaḥ
manaḥ dhātuḥ teṣām eva samanantara nirudhyam ṣaṣ vijñāna deśanā āśraya tām upādāya
yaḥ rūpa skandhaḥ tāni daśa āyatana dhātavaḥ
yaḥ vijñāna skandhaḥ tat manaḥ āyatanam
anye ye trayaḥ skandhāḥ rūpa dhātu eka deśaḥ ca
te saṃskṛtaiḥ sahitāḥ dharma āyatanam dharmadhātuḥ ca
ākāraka ātma lakṣaṇa dhāraṇa tām upādāya
skandha āyatana dhātu krameṇa dharma deśanāyāḥ prayojanam
trividha ātma grāha pratipakṣeṇa ayam kramaḥ
ātma grāhaḥ trividhaḥ eka ātma grāhaḥ
yatra yad pratidhātaḥ tatra tat sa pratigham  /

te kleśa utpāda pratyakṣa caryā viṣaya tām upādāyam

kati upādāna skandha saṃgṛhītāḥ ye sa āsravāḥ
sthāpayitvā rūpa śabda gandha rasa spraṣṭā avya dharmadhātūn
sapta cittadhātavaḥ dharmadhātu eka deśaḥ yaḥ caittaḥ
śiṣṭāḥ daśa dharmadhātu eka deśaḥ ca
manaḥ dhātuḥ manaḥ vijñāna dhātuḥ dharmadhātu eka deśaḥ ca
sva vijñāna sahita viṣaya sadṛśa tām upādāya
te eva sva vijñāna virahita sva anvaya sadṛśa tām upādāya
dhātu uddyeśa nirdeśakaḥ tṛtīya adhikaraḥ pariniṣṭitaḥ
ācārya vasubandhu viracit pañca skandha prakaraṇam samāptam
